name: Scrollow
description:
Scrollow—the game where the only thing you need to do is scroll, and it's best on mobile or touchpad
  • Scroll around to put new random tile in the stack.
  • Get three or more tiles of the same color together and they are removed!
  • Number on the tile is your score. Each removed tile gives you one point.
  • Chain remove tiles and get a ×2 multiplier on tiles of each next color.
  • You can place up to 15 tiles, and tiles get closer as you run out of space.
  • And every ten points the speed increases!

Score as much as you can! Good luck!
